																                    Treatment of myelodysplastic syndromes (MDS) may include the following:         -  Watchful waiting.    -  Stem cell transplant using blood stem cells from a donor.    -  Combination chemotherapy.    -  Lenalidomide therapy.    - A clinical trial of stem cell transplant using lower doses of chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of a new anticancer drug or targeted therapy.
